arts.ttl: Stuttgart confident Tiago Tomas can shine as a No. 9 against old club Wolfsburg
arts.sum: VfB Stuttgart trainer Sebastian Hoeneß has expressed full confidence in the newly re-acquired Tiago Tomas to lead the line against his old club Wolfsburg on Saturday afternoon.

arts.ttl: Hoeneß rules out Leweling while hinting at squad rotation against Wolfsburg
arts.sum: The VfB gaffer ruled out Leweling and also hinted that one or two others may be afforded a rest for workload management reasons.
